room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: After having a ball in the Gallery Heist room with my fiancé, I went back the same week with my grandmother and babysitter! Not only are the prices more fair than other escape rooms in the city, the staff is helpful/personable and the themes are unique!

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: This was a interesting experience. My girlfriend and I had a blast solving the Gallery Heist. Just try to avoid going during rush hour. The surrounding neighborhood is a nightmare to get out off.

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: This place is awesome. I came with my co-workers and we were blown away by how much thought had gone into the Gallery Heist. This is the greatest  activity we've done as an office, hands down. We are already talking about when we can come back. Thanks to all for making this a terrific experience!

room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Escape Artist DC in Washington, D.C.
review: So much fun. Creative and inventive. Loved it. Would go back again 100%.
